CmdLine: apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y build-essential unzip
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get install -y openjdk-11-jre     openjdk-11-jdk     openjdk-11-demo     openjdk-11-doc     openjdk-11-jre-headless     openjdk-11-source
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: pip install --upgrade pip &&     pip install jupyter
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir java-kernel &&     cd java-kernel &&     wget https://github.com/SpencerPark/IJava/releases/download/v1.3.0/ijava-1.3.0.zip &&     unzip ijava-1.3.0.zip &&     python3 install.py --sys-prefix
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir authenticators &&     git clone https://github.com/jupyterhub/nativeauthenticator.git &&     pip install -e nativeauthenticator
Commands.Name: run
